|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1802 |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[ASUS RT-AX68U]] (AX2700) • (HND-962118_BASE) :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/MSQ-RTAXIA00/ MSQ-RTAXIA00] (2020-08-05) {{See also|ASUS RT-AX86U|ASUS RT-AC86U}} {{FCC ST|08/10/2020|indexme.}} *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://dongknows.com/asus-rt-ax68u-ax2700-router-review/ ''ASUS RT-AX68U WiFi 6 Router'' on '''DongKnowsTech'''] *[https://dongknows.com/asus-rt-ax86u-ax5700-gaming-router-review/ ''ASUS RT-AX86U WiFi 6 Router'' on '''DongKnowsTech'''] ==Pictures==

[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] ==Notes== ===GPL info=== {{SCollapse|[https://github.com/MerlinRdev/tuf-ax3000/blob/master/release/src-rt/target.mak target.mak] • >> |
export HND-962118_BASE := HND_ROUTER=y PROFILE="962118GW" SAMBA3="3.6.x"

export RT-AX86U := $(HND-962118_BASE)
export RT-AX86U += BUILD_NAME="RT-AX86U" EXT_PHY="BCM84880" NVSIZE="128" DHDAP=y HND_WL=y DPSTA=y REPEATER=y DISABLE_REPEATER_UI=y IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y ARM=y AUTODICT=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y WEBDAV=y SMARTSYNCBASE=y USB="USB" APP="installed" PROXYSTA=y DNSMQ=y BCMWL6=y BCMWL6A=y DISK_MONITOR=y BTN_WIFITOG=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y BCMSMP=y XHCI=y DUALWAN=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y OPENVPN=y TIMEMACHINE=y MDNS=y VPNC=y BRCM_NAND_JFFS2=y JFFS2LOG=y NOTIFICATION_CENTER=y BWDPI=y DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y LINUX_MTD="64" DEBUGFS=y SSH=y EMAIL=y FRS_FEEDBACK=y SYSSTATE=y STAINFO=y CLOUDCHECK=y NATNL_AICLOUD=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y MULTICASTIPTV=y QUAGGA=y BCM_MUMIMO=y LAN50="all" ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y CFEZ=y TFAT=n NTFS="open" HFS="open" NEWSSID_REV2=y NEWSSID_REV4=y LAN4WAN_LED=y NEW_APP_ARM=y NETOOL=y TRACEROUTE=y FORCE_AUTO_UPGRADE=y ALEXA=y IFTTT=y SW_HW_AUTH=y HD_SPINDOWN=y BCMEVENTD=y LETSENCRYPT=y JFFS_NVRAM=y NVRAM_ENCRYPT=y IPSEC=STRONGSWAN IPSEC_SRVCLI_ONLY=SRV NATNL_AIHOME=y BCM_CEVENTD=y UTF8_SSID=y AMAS=y DWB=y DBLOG=y ETHOBD=y CONNDIAG=y CRASHLOG=y BW160M=y BRCM_HOSTAPD=y IPERF3=y FRS_LIVE_UPDATE=y ASUSCTRL=y INFO_EXAP=y AVBLCHAN=y
export RT-AX86U += LACP=n BONDING=n BONDING_WAN=n CFGSYNC_LOCSYNC=n

export RT-AX68U := $(HND-962118_BASE)
export RT-AX68U += BUILD_NAME="RT-AX68U" NVSIZE="128" DHDAP=y HND_WL=y DPSTA=y REPEATER=y DISABLE_REPEATER_UI=y IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y ARM=y AUTODICT=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y WEBDAV=y SMARTSYNCBASE=y USB="USB" APP="installed" PROXYSTA=y DNSMQ=y BCMWL6=y BCMWL6A=y DISK_MONITOR=y BTN_WIFITOG=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y BCMSMP=y XHCI=y DUALWAN=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y OPENVPN=y TIMEMACHINE=y MDNS=y VPNC=y BRCM_NAND_JFFS2=y JFFS2LOG=y NOTIFICATION_CENTER=y BWDPI=y DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y LINUX_MTD="64" DEBUGFS=y SSH=y EMAIL=y FRS_FEEDBACK=y SYSSTATE=y STAINFO=y CLOUDCHECK=y NATNL_AICLOUD=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y MULTICASTIPTV=y QUAGGA=y BCM_MUMIMO=y LAN50="all" ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y CFEZ=y TFAT=n NTFS="open" HFS="open" NEWSSID_REV2=y NEWSSID_REV4=y LAN4WAN_LED=y NEW_APP_ARM=y NETOOL=y TRACEROUTE=y FORCE_AUTO_UPGRADE=y ALEXA=y IFTTT=y SW_HW_AUTH=y HD_SPINDOWN=y BCMEVENTD=y LETSENCRYPT=y JFFS_NVRAM=y NVRAM_ENCRYPT=y IPSEC=STRONGSWAN IPSEC_SRVCLI_ONLY=SRV NATNL_AIHOME=y BCM_CEVENTD=y UTF8_SSID=y AMAS=y DWB=y DBLOG=y ETHOBD=y CONNDIAG=y CRASHLOG=y BW160M=y BRCM_HOSTAPD=y IPERF3=y FRS_LIVE_UPDATE=y ASUSCTRL=y INFO_EXAP=y AVBLCHAN=y
export RT-AX68U += LACP=n BONDING=n BONDING_WAN=n CFGSYNC_LOCSYNC=n

''AX5700 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router'' • [https://www.snbforums.com/threads/rt-ax86u-rt-ax5700-hits-the-fcc.61778/ SNB] :export RT-AX86U := $(HND-962118_BASE) :*[[ASUS RT-AX5700]] - ''AX5700 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AX88U]] -
